item.description:
Come to the Headquarters in Worcester any time between 9 AM - 8 PM! It doesn't matter if you've never attended a meetup event before - please come now. Training for phone banking, canvassing and becoming a precinct captain can be offered to anyone as they arrive. It is NOT necessary that you arrive promptly at 9 AM, but if you can come early, by all means do. There's a lot to get done at the new HQ, so please come - with guests!

The HQ is very close to Union Station in Worcester, and is accessible if you take the commuter rail from Boston (South Station or Back Bay).

Call Bob Dwyer at 508-930-5530 with any questions or comments.
item.why: Join us because getting precinct captains, phone banking and canvassing are important priorities at this point.
item.name: Training and Phone Banking in Worcester
